hero.title: Mebix
hero.description: Digital Therapy Companion for Diabetes Type 2
hero.tagline: A comprehensive mobile application that helps people with diabetes achieve their therapy goals through AI-powered nutrition tracking, personalized recommendations, and evidence-based medical guidance.

overview.title: Project Overview
overview.description: Mebix is a digital therapeutic companion designed specifically for people with diabetes type 2. I built the entire mobile application from scratch, implementing cutting-edge AI features and medical-grade security standards.
overview.impact: Helping thousands of diabetes patients improve their quality of life

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: Managing diabetes type 2 requires constant attention to nutrition, medication, and lifestyle changes. Traditional approaches often lack personalization and real-time guidance, making it difficult for patients to achieve their therapy goals.

problems.title: Complex Nutrition Tracking
problems.description: Manual food logging is time-consuming and error-prone

problems.title: Lack of Personalization
problems.description: Generic advice doesn't fit individual needs and lifestyle

problems.title: Poor Treatment Adherence
problems.description: Patients struggle to maintain consistent therapy routines

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: I developed a comprehensive React Native application that combines AI-powered food recognition, personalized medical recommendations, and gamified therapy adherence to create an engaging and effective diabetes management platform.

features.title: AI Food Recognition
features.description: Simply take a photo of your meal and let AI identify food items, estimate portions, and calculate nutritional values with medical-grade accuracy.

features.title: Personalized Recommendations
features.description: Every recommendation is tailored to the user's specific health profile, medication regimen, and lifestyle preferences.

features.title: Smart Daily Tasks
features.description: Color-coded task system that guides users through their daily diabetes management routine.

features.title: Educational Content
features.description: Interactive learning modules developed by diabetologists and cardiologists.

technical.title: Technical Implementation
technical.description: Built with modern React Native architecture and medical-grade security standards

results.title: Clinical Results
results.description: Mebix effectiveness is validated through rigorous clinical studies and real-world evidence

achievements.title: Medical Recognition
